summary: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.
cast: Larenz Tate|Keith David|Chris Tucker|Freddy Rodríguez|Rose Jackson|N'Bushe Wright|Alvaleta Guess|James Pickens Jr.|Jenifer Lewis|Clifton Powell|Elizabeth Rodriguez|Terrence Howard|Ryan Williams|Larry McCoy|Rodney Winfield|Cheryl Freeman|Sticky Fingaz|Bokeem Woodbine|David Barry Gray|Michael Imperioli|Jaimz Woolvett|Quynh Phann|Clifton Collins Jr.|Jean-Claude La Marre|Daniel Kruse|Bob Smith|Bernard Telsey|Rik Colitti|Heather B.|Carlton Wilborn|Frank Albanese|Monti Sharp|Tony Sirico|Robert LuPone|Joëlle Hernandez|Jordan Hernandez|Tim Zay|Charles E. keywords: vietnam war|1960s|black panthers|new york city|black militant
director: Directors: Albert Hughes (as The Hughes Brothers), Allen Hughes (as The Hughes Brothers)
title: Dinero para quemar
